We are a team of mental health advocates and healthcare veterans who believe providers shouldn’t have to decide between independence or administrative support; a diverse client base or a decent living; a full practice or clinical autonomy.

Our team works tirelessly to help you build a successful practice while allowing you to focus on what you do best… helping clients. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you!

Jake Cooper
CEO, Grow Therapy
